name: WGJ_130: It gets easier if you die
name_original: WGJ_130: It gets easier if you die
description:
Attack your Enemy and Collect Skill fragment. You can collect up to 4 Fragments and then you need to die in order to use them.

Controls:

ActionKeyMoveW,A,S,DAttackSpace

This Week I wanted to explore what's possible with the Animation. I never really did Attack Combos in Unity so I focused on this Topic. 

I'm kinda bummed that I had not enough Time for sounds. Because the iconic Lightsaber sound is defiantly missing.

Game For Mac or Windows

Tools:
Unity
MagicaVoxel
Sketch
